matrix.db
Class Structure

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--matrix.db.ErrorObject
        |
        +--matrix.db.Structure
All Implemented Interfaces:
ImageProvider, java.io.Serializable
public class Structure
extends ErrorObject

A class representing a Matrix Structure or "Structured Set". A Structured Set is the results from an expand done on a BusinessObject.

See Also:
expandIntoStructuredSet, expandIntoStructuredSetSort, Serialized Form

select

public ExpansionWithSelect select(Context context,
                                  StringList selectBusStatements,
                                  StringList selectRelStatements)
                           throws MatrixException
Deprecated. as of ADK version 9.5.1.0, use the version that passes list boolean.

Do an expand and select on a Structure.
Parameters:
context - the context for this request
selectBusStatements - - list of Strings containing Matrix select statements to be applied to the BusinessObjects in the Structure.
selectRelStatements - - list of Strings containing Matrix select statements to be applied to the Relationships in the Structure.
Returns:
ExpansionWithSelect
Throws:
MatrixException - when unable to retrieve data from the BOS
Since:
ADK 9.0.0

select

public ExpansionWithSelect select(Context context,
                                  StringList selectBusStatements,
                                  StringList selectRelStatements,
                                  boolean list)
                           throws MatrixException
Do an expand and select on a Structure.
Parameters:
context - the context for this request
selectBusStatements - - list of Strings containing Matrix select statements to be applied to the BusinessObjects in the Structure.
selectRelStatements - - list of Strings containing Matrix select statements to be applied to the Relationships in the Structure.
list - boolean true to force HashTable data to StringList otherwise ambiguous
Returns:
ExpansionWithSelect
Throws:
MatrixException - when unable to retrieve data from the BOS
Since:
ADK 9.5.1.0

subset

public Expansion subset(Context context,
                        int index,
                        int count,
                        Visuals visuals)
                 throws MatrixException
Get a subset of a structure. The root of the Expansion object will always be the original root of the Structured Set. The root of the Expansion is not counted in the count or index therefore an index of one, count of one will return the root and the first object in the Structure. NOTE: Indices for subsets start at one (1) for the first object.
Parameters:
context - the context for this request
index - - where to start in the structure.
count - - how many relationships to get.
visuals - the visuals to apply to the obects.
Returns:
Expansion
Throws:
MatrixException - when unable to retrieve data from the BOS
Since:
ADK 9.1.0
